readable.content: A man talks on the phone with his feet up . A man wearing a green t-shirt sits with his legs on a ledge and talks on the phone . A man with his feet up using a telephone . Seated man with red hat and green shirt is talking on the phone . The man in the green t-shirt has his feet up whilst talking on a cellphone .
